Description.Text: Best Western Plus Centre Hotel is an elegant 4-star property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of St. Petersburg. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, onsite dining and a great location close to Nevksy Prospekt. Nevsky Prospekt is a grand avenue lined with an array of beautiful, historic buildings. Nearby places of interest include Vosstaniya Square, the Art Nouveau Singer House, Moskovsky railway station and the Great Gostiny Dvor, an 18th-century shopping mall. Ploshchad Vosstaniya metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular St. Petersburg destinations. The hotel is housed in a 20th-century mid-rise building with a dark pink-coloured facade. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are approximately 28sqm and decorated in a bright, modern style with light wood furniture, carpeted floors and floor-to-ceiling curtains. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, a fridge and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. Du Nord serves French specialities in a welcoming atmosphere. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks at the bar, and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
